comment.author: 36183682@N05
comment._content: I think this picture is great! Usually when people look and think about old photographs, they usually think everyone (had to) look stotic and unemtional. This picture is a great thing to break that stereotype! Also, the women look like they are having fun.

comment.author: 32880694@N08
comment._content: this is the first time i have ever seen a vintage photo where the subject(s) are anything other than serious,i cant help but wonder about the photographers mindset here,this must have been really innovative for this period in time !
